A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing it twice\, I definitely would put this in my top 5 Star Wars films. Like in Empire\, things look pretty grim for our rebels\, but the humor balances out the darkness. The characters from TFA are all excellent again\, and it's fun to watch them develop and learn from their mistakes. I definitely want a Porg and a BB unit now\, so I'm definitely a sucker for their merchandising. I've spent the last few days discussing the characters and character motivations as well as the various themes explored throughout the film. I love films that inspire such rousing discussion.
